PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of "Aida" - Leading figures in repeat performance of "Aida," in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success..Mamie Hamilton..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mamie Hamilton wearing costume and headband, standing with hands behind back in interior of Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
